titles.title: Electing Members to a certain standing committee of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/6/2003--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the House on March 6, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Elects Members to the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct.
